block.p: Stephanie Jill Klein, a daughter of Patti Klein of West Palm Beach, Fla., and Michael Klein of Barnegat Light, N.J., was married last evening to Jeffrey Steven Wolf, a son of Debra and Ellis Wolf of Fort Lee, N.J. Rabbi Bruce Block officiated at the Oaks, a private house in New Rochelle, N.Y.

Mrs. Wolf, 28, teaches the fourth grade at the Adolph S. Ochs School in Manhattan. She graduated from the University of Arizona and received a master's degree in teaching from Fordham. Her mother is a co-host of ''Festival,'' a daily radio talk show on WPBR-AM in Palm Beach. The bride's father owns Doubles Marketing and Sales, a trimmings supplier to the apparel industry, in New York and Barnegat Light. The bride is a stepdaughter of Nancy Klein.

Stephanie Jill Klein, a daughter of Patti Klein of West Palm Beach, Fla., and Michael Klein of Barnegat Light, N.J., was married last evening to Jeffrey Steven Wolf, a son of Debra and Ellis Wolf of Fort Lee, N.J. Rabbi Bruce Block officiated at the Oaks, a private house in New Rochelle, N.Y.

Mrs. Wolf, 28, teaches the fourth grade at the Adolph S. Ochs School in Manhattan. She graduated from the University of Arizona and received a master's degree in teaching from Fordham. Her mother is a co-host of ''Festival,'' a daily radio talk show on WPBR-AM in Palm Beach. The bride's father owns Doubles Marketing and Sales, a trimmings supplier to the apparel industry, in New York and Barnegat Light. The bride is a stepdaughter of Nancy Klein.

Mr. Wolf, 30, is the marketing director in New York for AOL MapQuest, which provides maps and travel directions on the Internet. He graduated from the University of Michigan at Ann Arbor. His mother is a co-author of ''Garden State Golf Guide: Millennium Edition'' (Weathervane Press, 1999). His father, who retired as the owner of the National X-ray Products Corporation, a medical supplies business that was in Carlstadt, N.J., is now a real estate agent for Friedberg Properties in Tenafly, N.J.

WEDDINGS Correction: July 23, 2000, Sunday A report last Sunday about the marriage of Stephanie Jill Klein and Jeffrey Steven Wolf referred incorrectly to the Oaks in New Rochelle, N.Y., where the wedding was held. It is a guest house and holistic healing center, not a private house.

A report last Sunday about the marriage of Stephanie Jill Klein and Jeffrey Steven Wolf referred incorrectly to the Oaks in New Rochelle, N.Y., where the wedding was held. It is a guest house and holistic healing center, not a private house.
